mention.text: his last message to the country from congress
president and the members of congress on 8
that of guaranteeing that the elections will be absolutely fair and clean

elections -- following a consultation with the national electoral court -- for regional government representatives of the grau region , created on 1 march 1988 , made up of the following provinces : tumbes , contralmirante villar , zarumilla , huancabamba , morropon , paita , sullana , talara , ayabaca , and piura on 12 november 1989
zarumilla , huancabamba , morropon , paita , sullana , talara , ayabaca , and piura on 12
the people as well as all poltiical parties
